name: Update Order Until HOLD
author: CedCommerce

sections.description:
Update Order Untill HOLD extension allows Updation of product, product Quantity , Payment Method. User can update their order from their order detail page. By using this extension the admin can gives various functionalities to the customers like:

Main features

  • Update Order product Quantity.
  • Add new product to Existing order.
  • Remove product from an order.
  • Change their payment method.
  • Multiple times Order Updation.
  • Update order within given period of time.
  • If user want to update their order then he must complete the process otherwise order is not updated.
  • Easy to use and install
  • Easy to configure

Support

If you need support or have any question then kindly use our online chat window here or send us email at support@cedcommerce.com

sections.installation:
Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of Update Order Until Hold, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type “Update Order Until Hold” and click Search Plugins. Once you’ve found our Update Order Until Hold plugin you can view details about it such as the point release, rating and description. Most importantly of course, you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.

Manual installation

The manual installation method involves downloading our Update Order Until Hold plugin and uploading it to your webserver via your favourite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.
sections.faq:
What is Update Order Untill HOLD?

The extension allow user to add/update the exiting order items which have status “ON-HOLD”.

short_description: Add/update the existing order items which have status "ON-HOLD".
